message.entry: Only string and numeric arguments are accepted.
Input must contain only finite real nonnegative integers.
Destination base must be a finite real integer scalar.
Cannot convert to a base of less than two.
Specified number of columns must be scalar.
Specified number of columns must be a finite real integer scalar.
Specified number of columns in output matrix is too small.
The MSB flag must be the string 'right-msb' or 'left-msb'.
The number of input arguments must be between 1 and 4, inclusive.
